content.text: 0) In a saucepan over low heat, combine the butter, sugar and 1 cup chopped almonds.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@32:39 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the butter"@40:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "sugar"@52:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "1 cup chopped almonds"@62:83 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a saucepan"@6:16 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "low heat"@22:30 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Stir constantly until mixture boils, then do not stir or shake.
2) Heat to 300 to 310 degrees F (149 to 154 degrees C), or until a small amount of syrup dropped into cold water forms hard, brittle threads.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "300 to 310 degrees F"@11:31 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-2-1 "149 to 154 degrees C"@33:53 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until a small amount of syrup dropped into cold water forms hard, brittle threads"@59:140 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Pour onto a large buttered cookie sheet.
4) Immediately press chocolate chips onto the hot candy. As the chocolate melts, spread it into a coating over the candy.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "press"@15:20 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "chocolate chips"@21:36 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "the hot candy"@42:55 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "spread"@81:87 / AC
		:ppt ( "it"@88:90 / FOOD )
		:reshape ( "a coating"@96:105 / FOOD )
		:duration ( cond-4-0 "As the chocolate melts"@57:79 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:gol ( "the candy"@111:120 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Sprinkle finely chopped almonds over the top; cool, and break into uneven pieces.
